title: Yek Etefagh Sadeh aka A Simple Event 1973 WEB-DL Sonata Premiere
description:
In a village on the Caspian Sea, a young boy races off from school every day to help his alcoholic father sell fish on the black market, run errands for his ailing mother, and then return home for bed every night. This cycle continues until a "simple event" â€” a sudden death â€” disrupts the family's routine; but soon that too is subsumed as the daily grind for survival continues. Winner of the Grand Prize at the Tehran Film Festival, Sohrab Shahid Saless' debut feature is a touchstone for many of the acclaimed Iranian films to come in its seemingly effortless observational style and poetic attention to the quotidian. "Truthfully, Sohrab Shahid Saless is the father of modern Iranian cinema. If you eliminate A Simple Event from the history of our cinema, you would be destroying one of its strongest pillars" (Amir Naderi).


Language: Persian

Subs srt: Portuguese / English
